docs.snippet: A new campaign, aimed at mothers between 25 to 45, plays off the fact that the snack is known for the prize inside its box....

docs.abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column; PepsiCo's new ad campaign for Cracker Jack aims to reach target consumer of mothers aged 25 to 45, relying on social media rather than traditional advertising.

docs.snippet: Construction has taken off in the area once known as Tysons Corner as developers anticipate the arrival of the Washington Metro’s new Silver Line....
docs.lead_paragraph: Construction has taken off in the area once known as Tysons Corner as developers anticipate the arrival of the Washington Metro’s new Silver Line.
docs.abstract: Construction begins in area once known as Tysons Corner in Northern Virginia, 13 miles from downtown Washington, DC, as developers anticipate arrival of Washington Metro’s new Silver Line rail stop there; area, rebranded as Tysons, will give rise to complex of malls, hotels, and office towers.

headline.main: Tysons, a Northern Virginia Crossroads, Waits Impatiently for the Train
headline.print_headline: In Virginia, Waiting Impatiently for the Train
